content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company collects personal information of its employees in connection with their employment. The collected information includes, but is not limited to:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Identity information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Name, home address, correspondence address, home phone number, mobile phone number; date of birth; photograph (non-biometric technology), any additional emergency contact/next of kin and this person's contact information, as provided by the employee; driver's license number and car registration number (where needed for employment purposes); Social Security number or national identification number; photograph (in accordance with applicable law); marital status; and visa, passport and immigration information (where needed for employment purposes).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recruiting and onboarding information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (as further elaborated in the Applicant Privacy Notice): Job application; resume, curriculum vitae or biography and other information related to work experience history, educational history and degrees attained; interview notes; video and audio recording of the job interview; professional and other certifications; and information we may obtain (directly or through a service provider) when conducting a background check (to the extent permitted by applicable law); visa and/or permit information (where acquired, amended or renewed by the Company for employee and dependents).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employment details\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Details regarding the terms of the employment or relationship/agreement; salary and benefits; place of work, business trips, and remote work; passport number and other travel related information (where needed for employment purposes); dates and hours of work attendance and absence during the period of employment; and pay slips, remuneration and/or compensation history for the period of employment. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Financial information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Payroll, tax and insurance information; bank account or other similar account where employee salary and other work-related payments are deposited; salary seizure or garnishments; stock options or incentives; expense reports and the related credit card statements; and pension plans and related information.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Performance information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Performance related information; details of grade and job duties; absence records, including holiday records and self-certification forms; details of any disciplinary investigations and proceedings; and training records.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"System usage information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": User ID and passwords used by an employee to access the Companyâ€™s premises, computer or telecommunications network; and Internet Protocol (IP) address or other device location information of the desktop, laptop or other devices used by or on behalf of an employee to access EPAM's computer or telecommunications network onsite or through a remote connection.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Insurance and benefits information (to the extent permitted and in accordance with applicable law)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Health insurance and other benefit claims. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information about the commission or alleged commission of an offense \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to enable us to assess an employee's suitability for employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Not all of the information listed above will be collected for all employees and will vary, for example, depending on the personal circumstances of the employee and their role.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition to the above, the Company collects, holds and uses sensitive personal information (also called special categories of data) as described below. With the exception of sensitive data we need for administering the employment relationship or for complying with statutory requirements such as information on disabilities or health conditions (if voluntarily reported), we only base the processing of such data on your voluntary consent and only where obtaining such content is permitted by law. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Number of sick days and disability information \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"for compliance with our health and safety and our occupational health obligations; if the employee is disabled, whether any reasonable adjustment should be made in order to assist him/her at work; and sick pay. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
